name: User Login Test
description: Standard procedure for testing user login functionality across web applications

steps.action: Navigate to the application login page
steps.expected_result: Login page loads successfully with username and password fields visible
steps.validation_criteria: Page title contains 'Login' and form elements are present

steps.action: Enter valid username in the username field
steps.expected_result: Username field accepts input and displays entered text
steps.validation_criteria: Input field value matches entered username

steps.action: Enter valid password in the password field
steps.expected_result: Password field accepts input and masks the password characters
steps.validation_criteria: Password field type is 'password' and value is not empty

steps.expected_result: Authentication process initiates and user is redirected to dashboard
steps.validation_criteria: URL changes to dashboard path and welcome message is displayed

steps.expected_result: User profile information is visible in the header or navigation bar
steps.validation_criteria: User name or avatar is displayed indicating successful login
